trans-unit.source: This data comes from the KDD Cup 2009 customer relationship prediction challenge (<html></html>orange_small_train.data.zip<html></html>).<html></html> <html></html>The dataset contains 50K customers from the French Telecom company Orange.
trans-unit.target: This data comes from the KDD Cup 2009 customer relationship prediction challenge (<html></html>orange_small_train.data.zip<html></html>).<html></html> <html></html>The dataset contains 50K customers from the French Telecom company Orange.

trans-unit.source: Each customer has 230 anonymized features, 190 of which are numeric and 40 are categorical.
trans-unit.target: Each customer has 230 anonymized features, 190 of which are numeric and 40 are categorical.
